create.title: Create new client
create.description: After creating a new client, you will always be able to add and remove security operators and public keys to access the Providers E-Services

nameField.infoLabel: It will help you tell them apart

consumer.title: Your clients
consumer.description: In this section you can manage all the clients you have created

interopM2M.title: InteropM2M
interopM2M.description: Manage the API machine-to-machine clients. These clients allow you to exploit Interoperability outside of the web app
